  • nodesw
  • View page source

nodeswÂ¶

nodesw changes the vlan of a node to a specified vlan
requires xCAT 2.0, Switch configured with SNMP sets, and only tested on SMC8648T
nodesw -h|--help
nodesw [-v]  vlan
nodesw [-v]  show

Author: Vallard Benincosa
